name: Beach of Arias: The Almighty, Majestic and Quick-Witted Liane
name_original: Beach of Arias: The Almighty, Majestic and Quick-Witted Liane
description:
Liane enters a tournament to win the Golden Watermelon Smashing Stick of Fortune!

***Full playthrough completed as of v108! Have fun and do try out different combinations of weapons, armours and items!
